short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin for language learners that gives analytics on your web reading activity in different languages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As a language learner, you want to track how long you've been on pages of different languages, you want to set reading targets, and you wanted to be alerted when you hit them.

As if by some mystic coincidence of the cosmos, that's exactly what this extension does! Now you can focus on reading, rather than tracking time. This extension gives you an up to date, at a glance, view of the languages you've been reading in for the day and let's you know when you've hit your target times so you can give yourself a well deserved pat on the back.
